Synchronize: The timeout limit for response from synchronize process was reached.
Sincronizza: Raggiunto il limite di timeout per la risposta dal processo di sincronizzazione.

Synchronize: Path "%value%" is protected and cannot be used.
Sincronizza: Il percorso "%value%" è protetto e non può essere utilizzato.

Synchronize: Path "%value%" is not available and cannot be used.
Sincronizza: Il percorso "%value%" non è disponibile e non può essere utilizzato.

Synchronize: Path "%value%" may not include parent directory traversal ("../", "..").
Sincronizza: Path "%value%" may not include parent directory traversal ("../", "..").

Synchronize: Please set available and/or protected paths list(s) before validation.
Sincronizza: Impostare lista percorsi disponibili e/o protetti prima della convalida.

Synchronize: File with an extension "%value%" is protected and cannot be uploaded
Sincronizza: Il file con estensione "%value%" è protetto e non può essere caricato

Synchronize: After selecting a new media storage location, press the Synchronize button to transfer all media to that location. Media will not be available in the new location until the synchronization process is complete.
Sincronizza: After selecting a new media storage location, press the Synchronize button to transfer all media to that location. Media will not be available in the new location until the synchronization process is complete.

Synchronize: The "%1" file doesn't exist. Verify the file and try again.
Sincronizza: The "%1" file doesn't exist. Verify the file and try again.

Synchronize: Cannot resize image "%1" - original image not found
Sincronizza: Cannot resize image "%1" - original image not found

Synchronize: Cannot resize images - product images not found
Sincronizza: Cannot resize images - product images not found
